_description: A proverbial couplet, written as one line

RylandsLat394.Transcription: ffart on hylland fart ther þu nylle
RylandsLat394.Note:
Translates ‘Pede super colles pedes vbi pedere
                    nolles’ which follows.
RylandsLat394.Editions:
Pantin,  William A. 
             “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands
                Latin MS. 394.” 
             Bulletin of the John Rylands Library
         14 (1930): 81-114: 103.
